content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-12.5, -44.5) extracting iron plates from furnace at (-13.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-10.5, -44.5) extracting iron plates from furnace at (-11.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-8.5, -44.5) extracting iron plates from furnace at (-9.0, -48.0)

### Coal and Iron Ore Mining Site at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Iron Chest at position (42.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5)

### Iron Ore Mining Site at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Iron Chest at position (-16.5, -48.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-15.5, -48.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors Due to Insufficient Inventory
- Ensure you have enough iron ore in your inventory before attempting to supply furnaces. Repeated errors occurred when trying to supply furnaces at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), and (-9.0, -48.0) without sufficient iron ore.

### Errors When Placing Inserters
- When placing inserters, ensure there is enough space and the direction is correct. Errors occurred when trying to place burner-inserters next to furnaces due to existing structures blocking the placement. Consider increasing spacing or changing the direction.

### Errors in Connecting Belts
- Belts cannot be directly connected to furnaces. Use an inserter to take items from a furnace to a belt line. This error was encountered when attempting to connect furnaces directly to a belt line.

### Errors When Refueling Inserters
- Ensure the correct position of inserters when refueling. An error occurred when attempting to refuel a burner-inserter at position (41.5, -80.5) due to incorrect entity positioning.

By addressing these errors, efficiency in resource management and structure placement can be significantly improved.
